Subscription.Description: Domain Computer Events - local user, administrators group, service installed
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- Local Admins Changed --> <Select Path="Security"> *[EventData[Data[@Name='TargetUserName'] and (Data='Administrators')]] and *[System[(EventID='4732') or (EventID='4733')]] </Select> <!-- Local user created or deleted --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4720') or (EventID='4726')]]</Select> <!-- New Service Installed --> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID='7045')]] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='ServiceName'] != 'RubrikVSSProvider']]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
